Headline: Growth at AutoVRse | Generalist | Blood Donor
Comment:
Thanks a ton for doing this, Dilip. :)
Now that entrepreneurs are being celebrated decently, need to put-on more spotlight on non-Cricket athletes.

Don't know how and when the sports administration will be more professional (read: less corrupt), these stories should help young folks thinking about taking up sports as a career.
Nhi to every Olympics, we'll keep on repeating the same sob story w/o making changes in past 4 years.

Headline: Chief of Staff at epigamia | Ex-GOI (GeM, QCI) | Startups | Consulting | Leave it all on the court üèÄ
Comment:
Size of the fight in Navdeep is super infectious and inspiring. Thanks for this podcast Dilip. 

Some super critical spaces to solve for the future of sports in India from ground up - 
- Certified Coaches (Tiered programs)
- Modern facilities (Maintained) 
- Hosting great international and national matches (optimised for viewership as well to attract audiences) : Navdeep also talks about the impact CWG had on kids, viewers and organisers alike. 
- Sports Psychologists to overall help athletes prepare mentally and also holistically recover from injuries 
- Career Support for both professionals and coaches.
